name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Mitt Romney released his tax records and they showed that he earned$42 million over the last two years. So now the other candidates aren't running for president. They're running to be Mitt Romney.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Google Plus has introduced a new policy that allows nicknames. Unfortunately, it's a nickname they give you based on your search history.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Here in California, some Starbucks stores have begun selling beer and wine. When asked why, a spokesperson for Starbucks said, “Because sober people don't buy Michael Buble CDs.”

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Nick Nolte was nominated for Best Supporting Actor. It's his first major nomination since 2002, when he was nominated for Most Maniacal Mug Shot.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: President Obama gave his annual State of the Union address. And the State of the Union for 2012 is Kentucky. Congratulations.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: There's a State of the Union drinking game. Let me just say this, if you really are playing the State of the Union drinking game, you're probably an alcoholic.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Obama focused on four areas he believes are the keys to restoring economic security. Energy, manufacturing, education, and TV shows about cupcakes, which we love.
